description:
Kinako wakes up alone in the Seika Dorm after the trip to Kyoto. As he searches for Benio, he reminisces about how they first met. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Because I`m with You: Wai Wa Kinako Ya!
Je serai à vos côtés - Je suis Kinako
Soba ni Iru kara: Wai wa Kinako Ya!
そばにいるから WAI WA KINAKO YA!
